column4: Let me rephrase the question I have a folder I want to copy things to, but I cannot, as the owner is root. How can I copy into this folder?
ixaacariah. Yes I got ati drivers working in ubuntu, but they're rubbish
I'm having trouble with them, i've installed them, etc, but nothing happening
i used synaptic to grab them, and install them... but i aint noticing any difference... and i was told they had 3D support...
